General.Name: Daesung Eltec Co. Ltd
General.Description: DHAUTOWARE Co., LTD develops and supplies in-vehicle infotainment products to motor companies worldwide. The company's product line consists of audio, video, navigation, and communication systems; display audio systems; monitor systems; digital amplifiers; module systems; and driver assistance systems, as well as 4D vision around monitoring, lane departure warning, and forward collision systems. The company was formerly known as Daesung Eltec Co., Ltd. DHAUTOWARE Co., LTD was founded in 1979 and is headquartered in Seoul, South Korea.
